name: Squareometry
description:
Squareometry is a game that you control geometry shapes to pass levels with different kind of obstacles.

# Get through the obstacles and reach the end of the level. #


# Switch between shapes. #


# Teleport. #


Featuring


  • 30 hand-crafted levels with increasing difficulty;
  • Originally composed soundtrack;
  • You move through the levels with just the arrow keys of your keyboard or with the left analog in a controller;
  • Various obstacles to pass.
